seg-source.mrk: Enable Data Lake

target.mrk: 启用数据湖

trans-unit.source: Store and analyze large amounts of data by connecting and working with SAP HANA Cloud, data lake. Click here for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Store and analyze large amounts of data by connecting and working with SAP HANA Cloud, data lake.
Click here for more information.

target.mrk: 通过连接并使用 SAP HANA Cloud 数据湖存储和分析大量数据。
点击此处了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Store and analyze large amounts of data by connecting and working with data lake.

seg-source.mrk: Store and analyze large amounts of data by connecting and working with data lake.

target.mrk: 通过连接并使用数据湖存储和分析大量数据。

seg-source.mrk: What is it?

target.mrk: 这是什么？

trans-unit.source: Data lake is a fully managed cloud service for securely storing and analyzing large amounts of data that is infrequently updated. It leverages inexpensive storage options to lower costs, while maintaining excellent performance and full SQL access to data. For more information on data lake, please visit the <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/product/SAP_HANA_DATA_LAKE/cloud/en-US" scope="external">SAP HANA, Data Lake</xref> product page.

seg-source.mrk: Data lake is a fully managed cloud service for securely storing and analyzing large amounts of data that is infrequently updated.
It leverages inexpensive storage options to lower costs, while maintaining excellent performance and full SQL access to data.

For more information on data lake, please visit the <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/product/SAP_HANA_DATA_LAKE/cloud/en-US" scope="external">SAP HANA, Data Lake</xref> product page.

target.mrk: 数据湖是一种完全托管的云服务，用于安全存储和分析不常更新的大量数据。
所用的存储选项价格低廉，可降低成本，同时保持卓越的性能和对数据的完全 SQL 访问。
有关数据湖的更多信息，请访问 <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/product/SAP_HANA_DATA_LAKE/cloud/en-US" scope="external">SAP HANA 数据湖</xref>产品页面。

seg-source.mrk: Connect Data Lake

target.mrk: 连接数据湖

trans-unit.source: To use the data lake in your space, select the checkbox <uicontrol>Use this space to access the data lake</uicontrol>. Currently, only one space can connect to data lake.

seg-source.mrk: To use the data lake in your space, select the checkbox <uicontrol>Use this space to access the data lake</uicontrol>.
Currently, only one space can connect to data lake.

target.mrk: 要在空间中使用数据湖，请选中<uicontrol>使用此空间访问数据湖</uicontrol>复选框。
目前，只有一个空间可以连接到数据湖。

trans-unit.source: If you can't select this box, it means another space already has been selected to connect to data lake.

seg-source.mrk: If you can't select this box, it means another space already has been selected to connect to data lake.

target.mrk: 如果你无法选中此框，则意味着已经选择其他空间连接到数据湖。

seg-source.mrk: Working with Data Lake

target.mrk: 使用数据湖

trans-unit.source: You can now use your preferred SQL tool to create tables in data lake and access these tables via SAP HANA virtual tables in your open SQL schema.

seg-source.mrk: You can now use your preferred SQL tool to create tables in data lake and access these tables via SAP HANA virtual tables in your open SQL schema.

target.mrk: 现在可以使用首选的 SQL 工具在数据湖中创建表，并通过开放式 SQL 模式中的 SAP HANA 虚拟表访问这些表。

trans-unit.source: SAP Data Warehouse Cloud offers two stored procedures that you can use to easily create and access the tables. For more detailed information and examples on the stored procedures open<xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/63f764c25f1640e7b31803bbad5d57cb/cloud/en-US/12b6825ac6d34db9902460f665cfcb88.html" scope="external">Data Lake API</xref>.

seg-source.mrk: SAP Data Warehouse Cloud offers two stored procedures that you can use to easily create and access the tables.

For more detailed information and examples on the stored procedures open<xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/63f764c25f1640e7b31803bbad5d57cb/cloud/en-US/12b6825ac6d34db9902460f665cfcb88.html" scope="external">Data Lake API</xref>.

target.mrk: SAP Data Warehouse Cloud 提供两个存储的程序，可用来轻松创建和访问表。
有关存储程序的更多信息及示例，请打开<xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/63f764c25f1640e7b31803bbad5d57cb/cloud/en-US/12b6825ac6d34db9902460f665cfcb88.html" scope="external">数据湖 API</xref>。

seg-source.mrk: Using the Procedures

target.mrk: 使用程序

trans-unit.source: In your SQL tool, use the <codeph>"DWC_GLOBAL"."DATA_LAKE_EXECUTE" ( IN STMT NCLOB </codeph>) stored procedure in the schema <codeph>DWC_GLOBAL</codeph> to create tables in data lake. Please note, that the statements issued via this procedure are not audited.

seg-source.mrk: In your SQL tool, use the <codeph>"DWC_GLOBAL"."DATA_LAKE_EXECUTE" ( IN STMT NCLOB </codeph>) stored procedure in the schema <codeph>DWC_GLOBAL</codeph> to create tables in data lake.
Please note, that the statements issued via this procedure are not audited.

target.mrk: 在 SQL 工具中，使用存储的程序 <codeph>"DWC_GLOBAL"."DATA_LAKE_EXECUTE" ( IN STMT NCLOB </codeph>)（<codeph>DWC_GLOBAL</codeph> 模式中）在数据湖中创建表。
请注意，通过此程序发布的语句未经审计。

trans-unit.source: Then create SAP HANA virtual tables in your open SQL schema that refer to the tables in data lake. The virtual tables are used to query the tables in data lake. Use the following stored procedure to do this:

seg-source.mrk: Then create SAP HANA virtual tables in your open SQL schema that refer to the tables in data lake.
The virtual tables are used to query the tables in data lake.
Use the following stored procedure to do this:

target.mrk: 然后，在开放式 SQL 模式中创建引用数据湖中表的 SAP HANA 虚拟表。
虚拟表用于查询数据湖中的表。
为此，请使用以下存储程序：

trans-unit.source: You can now work with your SAP HANA virtual tables in the <uicontrol>Data Builder</uicontrol> by selecting the open SQL schema used for the data lake.

seg-source.mrk: You can now work with your SAP HANA virtual tables in the <uicontrol>Data Builder</uicontrol> by selecting the open SQL schema used for the data lake.

target.mrk: 现在，你可以通过选择用于数据湖的开放式 SQL 模式，在<uicontrol>数据模型构建器</uicontrol>中使用 SAP HANA 虚拟表。
